# Logisim PLA program table

#Input
#State[5] Instru[8] Status[3]

00000xxxxxxxxxxx 00001
00001xxxxxxxxxxx 00010
00010xxxxxxxxxxx 00011

#jmp
0001111110000xxx 11001
0001111101000xxx 11001
0001111100100xxx 11001
0001111100010xxx 11001
11001xxxxxxxxxxx 11010
11010xxxxxxxxxxx 11011
11011xxxxxxxxxxx 00001

#Move16
000111010x000xxx 11000
000111010x010xxx 11000
000111010x100xxx 11000
11000xxxxxxxxxxx 00001

#Halt
0001110101110xxx 10111
10111xxxxxxxxxxx 10111

#Move State
0001100xxxxxxxxx 00100
0010000xxxxxxxxx 00101
0010100xxxxxxxxx 00001


#ALU State
000111000xxxxxxx 00110
001101000xxxxxxx 00111
001111000xxxxxxx 00001

#Load Imm
0001101xxxxxxxxx 01000
0100001xxxxxxxxx 01001
0100101xxxxxxxxx 00001

#INC XY
0001110110000xxx 01010
0101010110000xxx 01011
0101110110000xxx 00001

#Load
00011100100xxxxx 01100
01100100100xxxxx 00001

#Store
00011100110xxxxx 01101
01101100110xxxxx 00001

#Load 16B imm
0001111000000xxx 01110
0111011000000xxx 01111
0111111000000xxx 10000
1000011000000xxx 00001

#Goto 
0001111100110xxx 10001
1000111100110xxx 10010
1001011100110xxx 10011
10011xxxxxxxxxxx 00001

#Call 
0001111100111xxx 10100
1010011100111xxx 10101
1010111100111xxx 10110
1011011100111xxx 10011
